p: Ethyl (E)-2-((1H-pyrazol-1-yl)methyl)-3-phenylacrylate (40). Purification using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (5:9 5 → 2:8) allowed the isolation of the product as a colourless oil in 31% yield. E: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.03 (s, 1H), 7.67 (dd, J = 7.7, 1.3 Hz, 2H), 7.54 (dd, J = 8.7, 2.0 Hz, 2H), 7.47 − 7.36 (m, 3H), 6.32 − 6.20 (m, 1H), 5.18 (s, 2H), 4.25 (q, J = 7.1 Hz, 2H), 1.30 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
